程序包 src.main.java.financial_story9

类 FinancialController

java.lang.Object
src.main.java.financial_story9.FinancialController
public class FinancialController extends Object
Title : FinancialController.java Description: Controller class for handling financial data visualization. Loads transaction data, processes it, and populates charts (pie and bar) with the data. Also beautifies the user interface and handles errors.

  • 方法详细资料

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller by loading data and populating the charts. Also beautifies the UI by setting a gradient background.

    • loadData

      private void loadData(String filePath) throws IOException
      Loads transaction data from a CSV file and processes it. The data includes income, expense, category, and date information.
      参数:
      filePath - The file path of the CSV data.
      抛出:
      IOException - If an error occurs while reading the file.

    • populateCharts

      private void populateCharts()
      Populates the pie chart and bar chart with processed data. The pie chart shows category-wise expenses, while the bar chart shows monthly income and expenses.

    • beautifyUI

      private void beautifyUI()
      Beautifies the user interface by setting a gradient background for the root pane.

    • showErrorDialog

      private void showErrorDialog(String title, String message)
      Displays an error dialog with the given title and message.
      参数:
      title - The title of the error dialog.
      message - The content message to be displayed.
